name: Partners Value Split Corp. Class AA Preferred Shares Series 13
longDescription: Partners Value Split Corp is a Canada-based investment fund. Its investment portfolio consists of an investment in the Class A Limited voting shares of Brookfield Asset Management Inc, which provides management and administration services to the company. Its objective is to invest in Brookfield shares that will generate cash dividends to fund fixed preferential cumulative quarterly dividends for the holders of the company.

fullAddress: 181 Bay Street,Suite 300, P.O. Box 762,Suite 300, P.O. Box 762, Toronto, ON, CA
